column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////The stuffed spinach bread came out in less than ten minutes.  It tasted great
column2: maybe because we were so hungry.  The bread was soft
column3: and as you ripped a piece off
column4: cheese oozed out.  It was seasoned perfectly
column5: and was devoured in a quicker time than it did to bake the thing.
